wikipedia_page.main:
Sir Paul James Walker (born 1954), styled The Hon. Mr Justice Walker, is a High Court judge.
He was educated at St Peter's College, Adelaide and Magdalen College, Oxford.He was called to the bar at Gray's Inn in 1979 and became a bencher there in 2005. He was made a QC in 1999, and judge of the High Court of Justice (Queen's Bench Division) since 2004.

response: Notable former members include Lord Sumption, Lord Alexander, Lord Phillips of Worth Matravers, Sir Richard Aikens, Lord Lloyd Jones, Sir Peregrine Simon, Sir Christopher Clarke, Lord Lyell, Sir Paul Walker, Sir Andrew Popplewell, Lord Leggatt and Sir Gerald Barling.
Paul Walker (1973−2013) was an American actor.
